attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Stop the government.
After several hundred years of so called democarcy we still find that the majority of people are governed by a small minority of "statesmen" and women. In most instances these people are in office because they received the most votes (of those cast). However this does not take into account the majority concensus that does not bother to vote.
I therefore petion the government to stop. and then let us find a better way of electing people to represent our views.

reasons: Outside the remit of the Prime Minister and Government
Intended to be humorous, or has no point about government policy
